summary: Simple Bat files for five custom class stats.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=6][center]R.C.B.F[/center][/size][/b][/u][font=Times New Roman][size=5][center]Requiem Class Bat Files
[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-oFZw4o_NOJk/VkqBeExAlUI/AAAAAAAAAdc/yupmIE5d1_Q/w1051-h591-no/The%2BLaw.jpg[/img]
.[/center][/size][/font][center][size=4]Simple Bat files for five custom class stats. 
[/size]
[size=5][u]Classes[/u][/size]
[size=4][b]Knight[/b]:[url=#3279053] One[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] handed 10, Two handed 10, Smithing 10, speechcraft 10, heavyarmor 10, block 20.[url=#36177582] Type[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] in console commands: bat Knight
.
[b]Chevalier[/b]: One handed 10, light armor 10, speechcraft 20, enchanting 10, marksman 10, block 10. Type in console commands: bat chev
.
[b]Witch[/b]: One handed 10, destruction 20,[url=#11550683] restoration[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] 10, conjuration 10, alteration 10, alchemy [b]10. Type in console commands:  bat witch
.
Thief[/b]: speechcraft 10, pickpocket 10, lockpicking 10, sneak 20, alchemy 10, lightarmor 10.  Type in console commands:  bat thief 
.
[b]Treasure Hunter[/b] : sneak 10, lightarmor 10, block 10, onehanded 10, speechcraft 20, lockpicking 10.  Type in console commands:  bat treshunter[/size][/center]
author: MTesh Bluke
